title: How to Know if You’re Iron-Deficient, and What to Do About It
description: Testing is fairly easy, and treatment can improve symptoms within months.By Alisha Haridasani Gupta and Alice Callahan
author: Alisha Haridasani Gupta and Alice Callahan

title: More Than a Third of Women Under 50 Are Iron-Deficient
description: The condition can cause fatigue and other symptoms but is rarely tested for. Here’s what to know.By Alisha Haridasani Gupta
author: Alisha Haridasani Gupta

title: Anheuser-Busch Says It Has Stopped Amputating Tails of Budweiser Clydesdales
description: The brewing company came under fire from PETA over the practice earlier this year. The procedure, known as tail docking, has been denounced by multiple veterinary organizations and is banned in several states and countries.By Orlando Mayorquin
author: Orlando Mayorquin

title: The New Reality for College Dining Halls: Dozens of Dietary Restrictions
description: A surge of students with allergies and special diets is challenging meal services and changing the shape of the campus cafeteria.By Priya Krishna
author: Priya Krishna

title: The End (of Summer) Is Nigh. Let’s Enjoy It!
description: We’re not done: Savor these last few weeks of summer with dance parties, a vegan festival and more.By Joshua Needelman
author: Joshua Needelman

title: How New York’s Public Hospitals Cut Carbon Emissions: More Vegetables
description: Making plant-based meals the default has reduced food-related greenhouse gas emissions by 36 percent, the mayor’s office said. Just don’t say “vegan.”By Cara Buckley
author: Cara Buckley

title: I Was Raised on Beef, but I’m Raising a Vegetarian Son
description: The illustrator Rachelle Meyer lays out her divided loyalties.By Rachelle Meyer
author: Rachelle Meyer

title: Should Trump’s Jan. 6 Trial Be Televised?
description: Readers offer different opinions and propose alternatives. Also: The Republican loyalty pledge; pig farming; driverless cabs; homesick at camp.

title: ¿Cómo es una dieta a base de plantas? Esto es lo que debes saber
description: No tienes que volverte vegano para reducir tu huella de carbono, pero limitar un poco las carnes y los lácteos es suficiente.By Melissa Clark
author: Melissa Clark

title: What’s a Plant-Based Diet? Here’s What You Need to Know to Eat Less Meat.
description: It’s not the same as going vegan, but it can also have a strong impact on reducing your carbon footprint.By Melissa Clark
author: Melissa Clark
